full_sentence: In the new advert Pandora jewelry wants us to beleeve a man knuckled his way into a store and bought his wondeful wife a diamond ring to show her how much he lovess her? Just another company using its advertising budget to try and propagate the idea men are at all competant.

Women that refuse to do it are worthless. I had one  claim someone rammed a dick into her throat when she was 16 and holding it there, so the fuck what? I gotta pay for someone else screwing you over? Not how it works. Same hoe tried to play the "legal virgin" game by only doing butt stuff. I bailed on her after a handjob that was ok, too many hangups. Any hangups on sexual services are just stupid excuses that translate as "I won't do that for you because I don't like you enough". And don't forget it.

I'd be 1000% more racist if I didn't spend a lot of my teenage years making racist jokes at my friends and having them return the favour.  That's what it took to show me that black people really are just like me

"if transwomen weren't born Male, what were they born as? Aliens? Because they're certainly not female! I've said it before and I'll say it again, biology doesn't give a shit about gender identity.". It's so sad that people who are supposedly smart and well educated will blindly spout this kind of nonsense, open your mind
